00058     function main($content,$conf,$code='LIST')  {
00059 
00060         $this->init($conf,$code);
00061 
00062         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->debugOutput = true;
00063 
00064         if ($this->piVars['submit']) {
00065             $content = $this->doSubmit();
00066         } else {
00067 
00068             switch ($this->code) {
00069                 CASE 'ADD':
00070                     $content = $this->showForm();
00071                     break;
00072                 CASE 'LIST':
00073                 default:
00074                     $content = $this->showList();
00075             }
00076         }
00077 
00078         return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00079     }
00080 
00087     function init($conf,$code) {
00088         $this->conf=$conf;
00089         $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00090 
00091         $this->tx_init();
00092         $this->tx_loadLL();
00093 
00094         $this->code = $code;
00095         if (!empty($this->piVars['code'])) $this->code = $this->piVars['code'];
00096 
00097         $this->conf['requiredFields'] = t3lib_div::trimExplode(',',$this->conf['requiredFields']);
00098         $this->userID = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->fe_user->user[uid];
00099         $this->ts = mktime();
00100 
00101         $this->fetchConfigValue('viewmode');
00102 
00103         if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('date2cal')) {
00104             $this->JSCalendar = JSCalendar::getInstance();
00105             if (($jsCode = $this->JSCalendar->getMainJS()) != '') {
00106                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['servicemgr_date2cal'] = $jsCode;
00107             }
00108         }
00109     }

00116     function showList() {
00117         $links[] = $this->tx_linkToPage(
00118             'Add new Event',
00119             $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00120             array($this->prefixId.'[code]'=>'ADD')
00121         );
00122 
00123 
00124         $content = '<ul>';
00125         foreach ($links as $link) {
00126             $content .= '<li>'.$link.'</li>';
00127         }
00128         $content .= '</ul>';
00129         return $content;
00130     }

00138     function showForm($defaultValues = array()) {
00139         $template = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template, '###ADDNEWEVENT###');
00140 
00141         $this->initDefaultValues($defaultValues);
00142 
00143 
00144         $marker = array(
00145             '###L_DATE###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_DATE'),
00146             '###L_TIME###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_TIME'),
00147             '###L_DATETIME###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_DATETIME'),
00148             '###L_SUBJECT###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_SUBJECT'),
00149             '###L_SERIES###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_SERIES'),
00150             '###L_PUBLIC###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_PUBLIC'),
00151             '###L_TAGS###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_TAGS'),
00152             '###L_REQUIREDTEAMS###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_REQUIREDTEAMS'),
00153             '###L_DUTYSCHEDULEOPEN###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_DUTYSCHEDULEOPEN'),
00154             '###L_DOCUMENTS###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_DOCUMENTS'),
00155             '###L_NOTES###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_NOTES'),
00156             '###L_NOTESINTERNAL###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_NOTESINTERNAL'),
00157             '###L_SUBMIT###' => $this->pi_getLL('L_SUBMIT'),
00158         );
00159 
00160         $marker = array_merge(
00161             $marker, array(
00162             '###V_DATE###' => $defaultValues['date'],
00163             '###V_TIME###' => $defaultValues['time'],
00164             '###V_DATETIME###' => $defaultValues['datetime'],
00165             '###V_SUBJECT###' => $defaultValues['subject'],
00166             '###V_PUBLIC###' => $defaultValues['public'] ? 'checked="checked" ' : '',
00167             '###V_DUTYSCHEDULEOPEN###' => $defaultValues['dutyscheduleopen'] ? 'checked="checked" ' : '',
00168             '###V_NOTES###' => $defaultValues['notes'],
00169             '###V_NOTESINTERNAL###' => $defaultValues['notesinternal'],
00170         ));
00171 
00172 
00173         if (is_array($this->formValidationErrors)) {
00174             $formError = $this->pi_getLL('error_missingfields').' ';
00175             foreach ($this->formValidationErrors as $k => $v) {
00176                 $formErrors[] = $this->pi_getLL('L_'.strtoupper($k));
00177             }
00178             $formError .= implode(', ',$formErrors);
00179             $formError = $this->throwErrorMsg($formError);
00180         }
00181         $marker['###FORM_ERRORS###'] = $formError;
00182 
00183 
00184         $marker['###DATE_CAL###'] = $this->getDate2Cal('tx_servicemgr_pi4[date]');
00185         $marker['###TIME_CAL###'] = '';
00186 
00187 
00188         //SERIES
00189         $series = $this->getSeries();
00190         if (!is_array($series)) {
00191             $seriesContent = $this->pi_getLL('error_noseries');
00192         } else {
00193             $seriesContent = '<select name="tx_servicemgr_pi4[series]" id="frm-series">'."\n";
00194             foreach ($series as $serie) {
00195                 $seriesContent .= ' <option value="'.$serie['uid'].'"';
00196                 if ($serie['uid'] == $defaultValues['series'])
00197                     $seriesContent .= ' selected="selected"';
00198 
00199                 $seriesContent .= '>'.$serie['name'].'</option>'."\n";
00200             }
00201             $seriesContent .= '</select>'."\n";
00202             $seriesAddLink = '<img title="'.$this->pi_getLL('title_addlink_series').'" alt="'.$this->pi_getLL('alt_addlink_series').'" src="'.$this->conf['addlink_img'].'" class="addIcon" />';
00203         }
00204         $marker['###SERIES_SELECTOR###'] = $seriesContent;
00205         $marker['###SERIES_ADDLINK###'] = $seriesAddLink;
00206 
00207 
00208         //TAGS
00209         $tags = $this->getTags();
00210         if (!is_array($series)) {
00211             $tagsContent = $this->pi_getLL('error_notags');
00212         } else {
00213             $defaultValues['tags'] = split(',',$defaultValues['tags']);
00214             foreach ($tags as $tag) {
00215                 $tagsContent .= '<input type="checkbox" name="tx_servicemgr_pi4[tags][]" value="'.$tag['uid'].'" id="frm-tags-'.$tag['uid'].'"';
00216                 if (in_array($tag['uid'], $defaultValues['tags'])) {
00217                     $tagsContent .= ' checked="checked"';
00218                 }
00219                 $tagsContent .= ' /> <label for="frm-tags-'.$tag['uid'].'">'.$tag['name'].'</label><br />';
00220             }
00221         }
00222         $tagsAddLink = '<img title="'.$this->pi_getLL('title_addlink_tags').'" alt="'.$this->pi_getLL('alt_addlink_tags').'" src="'.$this->conf['addlink_img'].'" />';
00223         $marker['###TAGS_CBS###'] = $tagsContent;
00224         $marker['###TAGS_ADDLINK###'] = $tagsAddLink;
00225 
00226 
00227         //TEAMS
00228         $teams = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTgetRows('uid,title',
00229                     'fe_groups', 'deleted=0 AND tx_servicemgr_isteam=1');
00230         if (!is_array($teams)) {
00231             $teamsContent = $this->pi_getLL('error_noteams');
00232         } else {
00233             $defaultValues['requiredteams'] = split(',',$defaultValues['requiredteams']);
00234             foreach ($teams as $team) {
00235                 $teamsContent .= '<input type="checkbox" name="tx_servicemgr_pi4[requiredteams][]" value="'.$team['uid'].'" id="frm-requiredteams-'.$team['uid'].'"';
00236                 if (in_array($team['uid'], $defaultValues['requiredteams'])) {
00237                     $teamsContent .= ' checked="checked"';
00238                 }
00239                 $teamsContent .= ' /> <label for="frm-requiredteams-'.$team['uid'].'">'.$team['title'].'</label><br />';
00240             }
00241         }
00242         $marker['###REQUIREDTEAMS_CBS###'] = $teamsContent;
00243 
00244 
00245         $marker['###DOCUMENTS_ADDLINK###'] = '<img title="'.$this->pi_getLL('title_addlink_documents').'" alt="'.$this->pi_getLL('alt_addlink_documents').'" src="'.$this->conf['addlink_img'].'" />';
00246 
00247 
00248         $actionLink = $this->cObj->typoLink_URL(array(
00249             'parameter' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00250             'addQueryString' => 1,
00251             'addQueryString.' => array(
00252                 'exclude' => 'cHash,no_cache',
00253         ),
00254             'additionalParams' => '&no_cache=1',
00255             'useCacheHash' => false,
00256         ));

00258 
00259         $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template, $marker);
00260 
00261         return $content;

00270     function initDefaultValues(&$data) {
00271         if ($data === array()) {
00272             $data = $this->conf['defaultValues.'];
00273         }
00274         foreach ($data as $k => $v) {
00275                     $data[$k] = is_array($v) ? implode(',',$v) : $v;
00276         }
00277     }

00285     function getDate2Cal($inputField) {
00286         $content = '';
00287         if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('date2cal')) {
00288             $this->JSCalendar->setDateFormat(false);
00289             $this->JSCalendar->setConfigOption('format','%d.%m.%Y');
00290             $this->JSCalendar->setConfigOption('ifFormat','%d.%m.%Y');
00291             $this->JSCalendar->setInputField($inputField);
00292             $content = $this->JSCalendar->renderImages();
00293         }
00294         return $content;
00295     }
00296 
00302     function doSubmit() {
00303         if ($this->piVars['submit'] && $this->doSubmit_validate()) {
00304             $startingPoints[0] = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id;
00305             if (!empty($this->cObj->data["pages"])) {
00306                 $startingPoints = explode(',',$this->cObj->data["pages"]);
00307             }
00308             list($date['day'], $date['month'], $date['year']) = split('\.',$this->piVars['date']);
00309             list($time['hour'], $time['minute']) = split(':',$this->piVars['time']);
00310             $datetime = mktime(intval($time['hour']),intval($time['minute']),0,intval($date['month']),intval($date['day']),intval($date['year']));
00311 
00312             $record = array(
00313                 'pid' => $startingPoints[0],
00314                 'datetime' => $datetime,
00315                 'subject' => $this->piVars['subject'],
00316                 'series' => intval($this->piVars['series']),
00317                 'public' => intval($this->piVars['public']),
00318                 'tags' => implode(',',$this->piVars['tags']),
00319                 'requiredteams' => implode(',',$this->piVars['requiredteams']),
00320                 'dutyscheduleopen' => intval($this->piVars['dutyscheduleopen']),
00321                 'notes' => $this->piVars['notes'],
00322                 'notes_internal' => $this->piVars['notes_internal'],
00323             );
00324             $record['l18n_diffsource'] = serialize($record);
00325             $record['tstamp'] = $record['crdate'] = $this->ts;
00326 
00327             $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery('tx_servicemgr_events', $record);
00328             $newUid = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_insert_id();
00329 
00330             $content=$this->detailViewEvent(
00331                 $newUid,
00332                 array(
00333                     'subparts' => array('subject','datetime','series','notes','backlink'),
00334                     'backlink' => array('str' => $this->pi_getLL('back'), 'id' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id),
00335                 ),
00336                 $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->cObj->fileResource('EXT:servicemgr/res/esv.html'), '###SINGLEEVENTEL###')
00337             );
00338         } else {
00339             $content = $this->showForm($this->piVars);
00340         }
00341         return $content;
00342     }
00343 
00349     function doSubmit_validate() {
00350         $result = true;
00351         foreach($this->piVars as $k => $v) {
00352             $this->piVars[$k] = !is_array($v) ? trim($v) : $v;
00353         }
00354 
00355         if (is_array($this->conf['requiredFields'])) {
00356             foreach ($this->conf['requiredFields'] as $field) {
00357                 if (!$this->piVars[$field]) {
00358                     $this->formValidationErrors[$field] = 1;
00359                 }
00360             }
00361         } else {
00362             $result = false;
00363         }
00364 
00365 
00366         $this->piVars['public'] = $this->piVars['public'] == 1 ? 1 : 0;
00367         $this->piVars['dutyscheduleopen'] = $this->piVars['dutyscheduleopen'] == 1 ? 1 : 0;
00368         $this->piVars['tags'] = is_array($this->piVars['tags']) ? $this->piVars['tags'] : array();
00369         $this->piVars['requiredteams'] = is_array($this->piVars['requiredteams']) ? $this->piVars['requiredteams'] : array();
00370 
00371 
00372         if (@count($this->formValidationErrors) !== 0) {
00373             $result = false;
00374         }
00375         return $result;
00376     }
